title: @Riot        Spirit Guard Udyr unlock problems.
body: So earlier today I fully crafted my Spirit Guard Udyr skin shard, I got the skin (of course), but I didn't get the 4 icons that come with. Now I had just watched a video where some guy actually got the icons and the skin. Any help?

replies.body: It looks like the icons were added to the account already.  There may have been a delay or required a relog, but all looks well!  Let me know if you still can't see it!
